text:
Oh my God... I had totally forgotten about this game, I used to be able to play this game upside down when I was 4...I really loved this game, shame I sold it...

I should buy it again, I'd really like to experience it again, if only for just the nostalgia.

Thank you for reminding me about this game Supra! :)
author: Oscar Ge

text:
I THINK I WOULDN'T ACKNOWLEDGE IT'S EXISTENCE IF IT WERE THAT BAD HINT HINT.
Also, it's not good to say something is good or bad simply based on looking at it. For all you know you may hate some ultra popular game and you may actually like an extremely hated game. Some people enjoy Sonic 06 for example. Can't really judge unless you've actually tried it yourself.
All joking aside, I know what that game is, I've played it, and it's horrible. It's not Bomberman. I don't believe it actually exists.

text:
